solution_line_template: Every donut costs him ${cost_per_donut} because {cost_per_dozen} divided by {dozen_size} equals <<{cost_per_dozen}/{dozen_size}={cost_per_donut}>>{cost_per_donut}
So he makes ${profit_per_donut} for every donut he sells because ${sell_price_per_donut} minus ${cost_per_donut} equals {profit_per_donut}
He needs to sell {donuts_needed} donuts because {goal_amount} divided by {profit_per_donut} equals <<{goal_amount}/{profit_per_donut}={donuts_needed}>>{donuts_needed}.
He needs to buy and sell {dozens_needed} dozen donuts because {donuts_needed} divided by {dozen_size} equals <<{donuts_needed}/{dozen_size}={dozens_needed}>>{dozens_needed}
